conversation.content: [confused] Wait, hold on. Eight months. It's been eight months. [pause] They keep saying, you know, "just a little longer" and "we're figuring out the budget" but that's what they said in, um... in March. And April. [angry] And May and June and July. subject: Realizing you've been working as an unpaid intern disguised as a "learning opportunity" for eight months with no path to employment
